content4: Lost your password? Click on the forgot your password link.
content5: Click on the Register Now Button to create a new account.

content1: Click on a button to go to a page.
Search to the cocktail by entering the ingredient or type of alcohol.
Click on the name to go to the Cocktail Page
content2: Or search again for the right cocktail.

content1: Scroll down to see all the ingredients & instructions
Click on the button to generate a Random cocktail.
content2: Is it not the right one? Click again on the Generate button.

content1: Scroll down to see all the ingredients & instructions.
Click on the type of alcohol to go to the page
Click on the Cocktail-name for ingredients & instructions
Click on a ingredient in the list to see all the Cocktails it contains
